website_summaries.verdict: This slow cooker can warm small dishes at home for parties and tailgating.
pros: Works well for entrees as well as desserts
Dial is simple, easy to set
Good for people who live alone
Heats up fast and is better than lugging larger slow cookers to events
Stainless steel exterior and glass lid
cons: Can be hard to mix in as the container spins around and needs holding
May put off chemical odor when plugged in initially

customer_reviews.title: So perfect in size
customer_reviews.text: This is so perfect for when you live alone. I hate using my big crockpot for small meals, i'm also not a big leftover fan. This is big enough for a meal or soup for one person with two servings. It arrived in great condition I used it the day I got it and it heated up and worked just like my big crockpot. The cord is a bit short. I will probably be using this on an every other day basis to cook a meal while I'm in class. It's just the perfect size to cook one meal for one person!
customer_reviews.author: leandraTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: Great for one person
customer_reviews.text: I’ve made soups, chicken, bread, queso, etc in this little crock so far and am learning more uses for it. I’ve cooked on high, low, and have used the warm setting with good results. One side seems to get warmer than the other on high. Overall I suggest it! This would be great for a college dorm, small living space, or tiny house where meals are for one or two people. I have a larger one from a different brand that I use for work potlucks and this one matches with it perfectly even though they have different brand names. Glad I found this little crock so I don’t have to heat the whole house with the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great way to cook for one
customer_reviews.text: i live alone and cook poorly. making large batch and freezing is no good because if i screw up, i still have to eat it for a while. making small batch in big pot, i just feel like a loser. whatever. i wanted a crock pot, and this one does what it is supposed to. i am very pleased with its performance. it gets hot enough to boil, things cook evenly and quickly, and there could even be leftovers, if you're brave. i'm glad i bought this - very good item and of course, affordable.
customer_reviews.author: a reader

customer_reviews.title: Warm is lava
customer_reviews.text: So after doing some research the "warm" setting is supposed to be around 165 degrees. This things "warm" is over 200. Dries out the food quicker and makes grabbing a bowl and being able to enjoy it quickly impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Ender

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to take to a party where I was bringing a hot dip. I put my dip in the removable crock then put it into the base, plugged it in and switched the knob through the various settings, Hi, Low, Warm. The light didn't light up and the thing never got warm. I had to run to a local store and get another one for the party. Sent this back and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Cherub38

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This crockpot comes in a cardboard box. No real company, shipped straight from China. It is not stainless steel. It is aluminum. When you turn this pot on it smells like burning plastic. That was with only having the pot on for 5 minutes. I could only imagine 2 or 3 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Ro

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After just a few uses, this slow cooker, set on low, overheated, spewing its boiling content all over my kitchen counter. I would not recommend this to anyone. I have purchased other Elite products and they have performed very well (one hotplate lasted for many years). Perhaps the slow cooker I got was the dud in that particular batch.
customer_reviews.author: B. LaPierre

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my V-Steams
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for vaginal steaming using herbs and it holds approximately 6 cups of water and the temperature control works like a charm. Keeps my steam active for the full 20 - 30 minutes but I do boil my water and herb on the stove top then transfer to crock pot for continuous heat so my steam doesn't die down. If I could do it over, I would get the 2 quart size because more water = more steam ☺️ I cant speak to its cooking properties, sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Nekisha

customer_reviews.title: This slow cooker worked fine for only a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: This slow cooker worked fine for only a couple of months, now it only keeps food warm. Strange that it quit working just about the time the warranty expired! I advise against buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kay S

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: 1st time use I smell burn plastic as soon as I turned it on. Tried to boil water with it in high setting took 30 minutes and the water was still just barely warm whole the surface of the pot is super hot. I wouldn’t trust to use it to cook my food for hours, definitely gonna explode.
customer_reviews.author: jacky lam

customer_reviews.title: Warm setting is too hot.
customer_reviews.text: The warm level seems to be the same as the low setting. Pot boils on warm setting with nacho cheese inside ruining the cheese.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Huffine

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I’m a single man and this was a big game changer for me. I had a bigger crockpot but was wasting the food which bugs me. So I got a smaller pot, this Can fit three good sized chicken breasts, or four boneless thighs. I use it a lot to cook chicken for pulled tacos, nachos, salads and rice dishes. Cooks on high for about 2.5 hours or low for 5.5. Can see how this would be perfect for soups for one, would probably make two or three good servings.
customer_reviews.author: Storm Petrels

customer_reviews.title: Love but HATE this product.
customer_reviews.text: Love but hate this product. The product is ok and does it's job. However the plug is about 8 inches long. I have to use an extension cord to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: lad

customer_reviews.title: Winner winner, chicken dinner!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this several times after purchasing here on Amazon. Great little micro slow cooker! I have made meatballs, petite filet steaks, and some rice. All turned out excellent. The "low" setting is perfect for traditional (expected) slow cooking times. The "high" setting is really, really strong (be careful!). The "warm" setting is perfect. That is something I wish my bigger Crock pot had. The warm setting keeps it JuSt RiGhT! :-) Clean up is a breeze, glass lid is solid, cord is kinda short. Perfect size for single, old, fat, retired turds like me who are lazy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris DIYer

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didnt expect this to work this good because of the price but...it proved me wrong. It took less than 6 hours to fully cook the beef and veggies. I did switch back and forth from low to high once after 2 hours then put it back to low heat. Fast, effective space saver, and the heat settings is very strong. It would be a five star if it was easy to clean. other than that I would repurchase and recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CrazyBeautiful

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and Works well
customer_reviews.text: This isn't my first Elite purchase, but it is my first purchase of a slow cooker and I'm so pleased that I bought it. It's just right for me, and made the best tasting turkey soup. I work all day and usually come home to a cold kitchen, with cold/uncooked food. I can't wait to come home to a hot meal, or just wake up to one. The settings are perfect and the size makes enough for two servings. My only wish was that it could automatically switch to 'warm', once the food is done cooking. Maybe it needs ALEXA for that.:) Thanks Elite!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow cooker exploded after around a year of usage
customer_reviews.text: The glass lid was broken after around a year of usage. It happened during cooking a meat in the same way as I usually do. I needed to throw the whole thing away and my kitchen was covered by glasses then. It is an okay product for the money you pay. It is not easy to clean and the high temperature is higher than it should be. I would not buy the product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great SMALL crock pot
customer_reviews.text: This is a great SMALL crock pot. To give you an idea of how big it is, I have used it to make hot dip - the following ingredients fill it about 3/4 full (1 pound sausage, 1 can rotel, 1 block of cream cheese). Works great, easy to store! Great for side dishes.
customer_reviews.author: JJW

customer_reviews.title: dont buy this
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this small crockpot. granted in was very cheap I used it yesterday for the first time. making a beef stew. I did have it on high but when i checked the stew the lid shattered. I have never seen this happen. worried that glass particles could have gotten in stew I threw everything out.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Juren

customer_reviews.title: Nice pot for a small household.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says it can do. A simple pot for my one person household. Lost one star for the outer pots glaze and it takes a long time before the factory smell burns off. Would be great for warm dips at parties. I use it also to make small amount of beans. A half cup of rinsed dry beans and quart of water. Put on high and they are ready in about four hours. No pre-soaking needed at least for black beans.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: I liked everything about it except for the fact that the ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it except for the fact that the cover did not fit securely (it wobbled and there was approx. a 1/8" to 1/4" gap). Unfortunately, I found this out when I was using it at work for the first time, opened the box, which I had never opened, and saw that the cover did not fit snugly, as you would normally find with 99.9% of all crock pots.
customer_reviews.author: ANNE I.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking oatmeal
customer_reviews.text: We paired this with a smart electrical outlet adapter, and set the outlet to turn on at 4:45am and off at 6:15am. We put 1C of Quaker Old Fashioned rolled oats and 2.5C water in the crockpot in the evening, and turn the knob to HI. When we wake up we have hot oatmeal waiting. We turn the knob to OFF when we start serving the oatmeal, as a safety measure in case we forget to fill the pot the night before. The pot will hold 1.5C oatmeal with water, but that's way more than we need for three people.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Quality is probably my main one but it depends on what you are talking about.
customer_reviews.text: What I dislike is that the outside unit gets so "very" hot and it isn't easy to keep from touching it when you are stirring something in the pot or just checking on it. Kind of like "old habits" as to how you do things is probably part of my problem so I guess I will just have to learn other method of how I "use" the pot. But, even though I don't have any small children around, I consider it to be dangerous for them should they get close to it when in use. Perhaps for a bit of an increase in cost, something could be done to make that "outside" temperature more reasonable. Thank you for your time.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Ives

customer_reviews.title: Super hot - even on warm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as a baby bottle warmer. I kept water in this and kept it on warm. Warm = super hot. While it was great that the bottles heated up quickly due to water being so hot, it also required me to leave the bottles out for a bit so it was cool enough to touch. I did try to make a dip in the crock pot, but it was burned quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Peters

customer_reviews.title: So glad to have this item.
customer_reviews.text: Three experiments have worked out well. I just toss things into the ceramic pot and walk away. Layer the food with the longest to cook on the bottom. My strategy is to prep the ingredients the night before, refrigerate and put in the ceramic pot in the AM. Holds more than enough for two people. Very pleased with this "little puppy."
customer_reviews.author: suzukela

customer_reviews.title: Keeps food warm at the perfect temperature
customer_reviews.text: I bought this small slow cooker primarily to keep dips, sauces and gravies warm during family get togethers. When i first received it i tested it with water and over the course of a few hours it maintained a precise temperature of 140 degrees on the warm setting which is what i was aiming for. Overall the crock insert and lid seem to be great quality. Very content with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great slow cooker-- twosome meal prep
customer_reviews.text: this arrived a couple days ago and i have already put it to use.It's size is absolutely perect for making slow cooker dishes for one or two people. I took a regular slow cooker chicken breast with veggies recipe and reduced it for one person. turned out perfectly. moist . and no waste !. next day I did a bean soup which is good for two meals for me. This small slow cooker solves many problems as I love slow cooking but larger ones produce way too much. So glad I bought it. It is also very well made and the cover and pot are both dishwasher ok. Highly recommend !!!
customer_reviews.author: E S BROWN

customer_reviews.title: You Really Do Need This
customer_reviews.text: If you're a busy person, you work from home, you're a student, a beginner cook or an experienced one, you need this little slow cooker. Originally purchased to let oatmeal cook overnight, its use quickly expanded to small batches of soup, hot dips, dried beans and lentils, sauces and much more. Within two weeks of owning it we realized we needed at least one more and I'm back to buy it. This would also make a great little gift. Get one! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs McC

customer_reviews.title: Great little pot
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price. Quality seems good. Like the three temp controls. I like "real" stone cut oatmeal and I put it in this at night on warm and let it cook all night. Perfect Irish outmeal in the morning. Beats standing over a stove for 30+ minutes to get the same result. Cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: Gen. Contractor

customer_reviews.title: Inside the pot was damaged.
customer_reviews.text: My slow cooker arrived , I purchased this to make steel cut oats overnight The reviews for this product were great. Well I opened the package took out the ceramic pot to clean it and the inside of the cooker was bent! I’m going to try to use it tonight because I have no way of returning it due to covid. I will keep you updated. The delivery was quick and the seller does offer exchanges I’m just not capable of taking that offer right now. I will keep you posted.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy A.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was getting frustrated looking for a tiny slow cooker. Some of the better known brands didn't have a "warm" feature - or a removable liner; a few didn't even have an "off" setting. I wanted one with 3 settings (warm, low, high) plus "off", of course, and a removable stone liner. This little guy delivers. 6 cup capacity is perfect. It takes a few hours on high to reach a boil, but it does reach one. Love this little thing!
customer_reviews.author: mezzavoce

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: With just two people in the home, this little "workhorse" is ideal for cooking a meal for us. I have a big 3 1/2 quart slow cooker, but too big. This little 1 1/2 quart is ideal and for a small cabinet space, doesn't take up a lot of room. Thanks for having it on line..
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Great little pot
customer_reviews.text: I love this size because it is great for one or two. I have one and have used it for yes but it finally stopped working. This one is better as it has different settings. Last night I fixed 2 good size chicken breasts in it. Again this is a great size for two. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three temperature settings make it great for cooking or keeping food warm.
customer_reviews.text: This model has three different temperature settings. Low, high, and a keep warm setting. I've used it for spaghetti sauce, sloppy joes, and teriyaki chicken wings. The crock lifts out for easy cleaning. Perfect size for couples or small families or for bringing snacks to a get together.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W

customer_reviews.title: I got this to use for jewelry pickle
customer_reviews.text: I think this little crock pot is great! I got it to use for pickling jewelry after soldering. I saw another review of a customer who bought it for the same reason and said they had issues with the contents leaking into the bottom of the crock pot.. I have not yet had this issue and I've been using it for a few months now. It gets hot pretty quick and it is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for 2 (or 3)
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a meal for 2 or 3. I seared 1lb ground beef w half large onion (On the stove). Then added that to slow cooker w a cup of chopped tomato (or add 2 T tomato paste to stove mixture), 3 smashed garlic cloves, oregano, thyme, salt, pepper, and some stock (3/4 cup). Beautiful. Put 3/4 of meat with pasta and cheese. Put the rest on Detroit style pizza the next day, covered w cheese first all over to the rim, then meat, then fennel seed. Can’t go wrong w the small size. Don’t let the small size fool you. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rose

customer_reviews.title: A little bigger than the very small ones and adjustable temperature - perfect for hot dips
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a small one that we used for hot dips after it was dropped and broken. This unit is bigger... and extra size is welcomed. Those little ones are just too small. This is a perfect size. The old one got too hot and wasn't adjustable. This one has several heat settings so you don't burn your mouth on hot queso dip!
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I needed to take a dish for Christmas Day that I had to keep warm. This crockpot was the perfect size. I didn’t want a large crockpot. The 1-1/2 quart held four cans of whole corn (minus a little bit of the liquid) and kept it nice and warm through the whole meal. The removable crock cleaned up with ease. It was a last second buy and arrived on time Christmas Eve just like they said it would (thank you Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Massage Oil Warmer.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this for warming massage oil and it is THE BOMB!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great for dips!
customer_reviews.text: I use this little slow cooker all the time to make dips and it works great. The price on it is excellent. The only complaint I have is that the temperatures can be a bit harsh. I've burned dips on low if I don't stir them in time, and have to use a lot of caution when I have it set to high. Warm does it's job though.
customer_reviews.author: NHTFR

customer_reviews.title: Nice for dips
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my roommate as a gift and she loves it! It heats pretty evenly and quickly without getting to hot. She mostly makes dips or heats frozen soups and they turn out great!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy heating
customer_reviews.text: Love this lil pot. My husband takes lunch almost everyday and heats it up in this, takes about 30 minutes to get it nice and hot. We’re anti microwave so this is a great alternative for us. This is our second machine only because the ceramic bowl inside dropped. Been using it for years now and don’t plan on stopping.
customer_reviews.author: F.A

customer_reviews.title: Does not perform well making oatmeal.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Elite Gourmet slow cooker for my mother who moved recently and has been unable to find her old "Crock Pot" She only uses the small size to make steel cut oats for her daily breakfast. This item has not performed like her other one. She has tried different times and more or less water, but no success. The product looks nice and it had good ratings, but it simply does not work for a very simple task, which is the only reason I bought it. I will just need to buy her the 1.5 size Crock Pot.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great little crockpot for appys
customer_reviews.text: We go to a lot of parties where I am asked to bring an appetizer or dip. I am always reheating in the microwave several times at a party. This little guy makes it so much easier to plug in and keep an appetizer warm. I've used it twice so far and it works well. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is the lack of a latching system. I have to make certain the top is on and won't get knocked over when traveling. A latching handle would make this perfect!
customer_reviews.author: My 2 Cents

customer_reviews.title: not as people say too much bad things
customer_reviews.text: this has so much wrong can not say too much just do not buy keep looking wish i had
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Freeze

customer_reviews.title: Very small and does not heat evenly
customer_reviews.text: This was far smaller than I had anticipated, my mistake, and may be perfect for somebody looking to make single portions of anything, but when I cooked a white sauce in it it scorched in rings and certain areas got far hotter than other areas so buyer beware... For a liquid based broth or soup it may be fine but for something that can burn, it will burn.
customer_reviews.author: Steelerpride

customer_reviews.title: Where the knob setting are on front because they wipe off.
customer_reviews.text: I love my little pot. We like dried beans and I can cook just the right amount for us. I put one cup of dried beans, two cups water. Let set over night. In morning rinse well. Mix and add 2 cups chicken bouillon and cook until done. Add more bouillon if needed. The only fault I have is the writing on front wiped off so I had to remember where each setting is. That is why I had to give it a 4 Star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit working!
customer_reviews.text: I only had this little slow cooker for a couple of years before it quit working on me! I love these little slow cookers as they are good for so many uses, so I was extremely disappointed when it quit working. They usually last a lot longer than this one did. Trying a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: sheart

customer_reviews.title: Temperature is set at a good setting just start off on low and keep it ...
customer_reviews.text: For this price and quality you cannot beat it, for anyone using this as a fondue center piece make sure you have extra butter or milk on hand. Temperature is set at a good setting just start off on low and keep it on low, it will take a little longer to melt but it will continue to stay melted. My mistake was setting it on high to melt the chocolate then setting it to low only for the chcolate to harden. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: pebbz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for one person!
customer_reviews.text: This little slow cooker definitely packs a punch! I have made soups, meatballs, rice, and so many other things in this. It cooks meats and root vegetables extremely well! It is very, very small and at the most you can feed two people from it. This is so perfect for a dorm or small apartment! It hardly takes up any of my counter space and after a long day a work it feels nice to be able to dump ingredient in, leave, and in an hour or two have a great, healthy meal!
customer_reviews.author: DeeRange

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a single portion
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I am in a special diet and I wanted to single portion my meals. This works perfect. I add in all my ingredients and put it on low for a couple of hours and food comes out delicious. Fits great in the dishwasher and doesn’t take allot of countertop space.
customer_reviews.author: S.H Mom

customer_reviews.title: A must have in a 1-2 person household
customer_reviews.text: I just love that it is great for one to two meals especially for us empty-nesters it makes life easier if I want to make a salad and make something different for my husband. This is a must in my household yes I had one previously but it was different than this this is so much better he has much more features.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy Little Crockpot
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two and returned one because inside of crockpot was not glazed well.. had rough and sharp areas. The one I kept worked very well and was exactly what I needed for a party. Very well made, easy to use, had good and even heating and it was easy to clean. Return process for the defective unit was smooth and easy. LOVE the one I kept...great for small meals for one or two or for hot dips or ice cream toppings.
customer_reviews.author: gypsyloo

customer_reviews.title: I love this little pot because it's so darn handy without being a burden to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little pot because I use it to melt my paraffin wax or warm my oils to create infused oils. The inner ceramic bowl is easy to clean. I actually got two of these. One is for the aforementioned reasons along with making my homemade body butters and the second one is for food.
customer_reviews.author: #AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Right size for 2
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother as a regular sized crock pot was to big for her and she thought this was perfect. It is smaller (obviously ) so it is lighter and easier for her arthritic hands to hold as she's washing, she can fit 1/2 a pork loin in here and that is the perfect size for her and her companion. She loves it so I would say this was the perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: C. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a lot, it's a slow cooker and it does what you'd expect it to do. Definitely not designed for more than 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: CheeseheadED

customer_reviews.title: Great performance but short on longevity
customer_reviews.text: This was a faithful servant for 1 1/2 years; now it seems to have died. Bummer. Still debating whether to order another or try a different brand. It was used heavily to steep tea for weeks at a time, and did a perfect job at the lowest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Saamigirl

customer_reviews.title: Love this crock pot
customer_reviews.text: Great small size, but you can put a lot of ingredients inside. Using the plastic lines, the crock pot is super easy to keep clean. I actually refrigerate the meal leftovers in the crock pot liner, since it holds the liquid, too.
customer_reviews.author: Seasongs

customer_reviews.title: Well Done, Maxi-Matic!
customer_reviews.text: This little counter-top appliance is great-versatile, compact and easy to program and use. We ordered this to use as a carafe to hold dip during holiday get-together s. Found out we can use to prepare many table-side mini meals, fondue and hot appetizers. A great addition to our electronic kitchen appliance collection.
customer_reviews.author: vanmanhh

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size for parties
customer_reviews.text: I agonized between this crock pot and the little dipper, because this one is bigger. I was afraid it would be too big, but it's actually perfect. If you're going to an office party the little dipper is probably not quite big enough. And countless people have commented on how great it is because you have temperature options, unlike the LD. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Electric slow cooker. SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Nice little slow cooker. Make sure you understand the size before purchasing. Its 1.5 QT....how much is that????Its roughly 5.75" in DIAMETER and 4" deep. You could say "single serve size" !!!
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two.
customer_reviews.text: This little 1.5 quart slow cooker works great and is just the right size when cooking for two. Easy to use, easy to store, easy to clean, inexpensive and no leftovers! What's not to like? Great for parties and pot lucks, too. Serve warm dips, soups, sides or smaller portions of saucy meatballs or pulled pork. At this price you can afford multiples - each dish kept at it's own best temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby's Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great size for small meals
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to make 1-2 person slow cooker meals and it does the job. I can cook beans in this little pot and it is a perfect size if I do not want to make a large amount of anything. For larger recipes, I had to cut portions down by a half to 2/3.
customer_reviews.author: D P Fong

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot! And easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little crock pot for a few bowls of soup or nacho cheese. Even the lowest temperature gets hot so I’m sure you could actually cook raw meat in it like a full-sized slow cooker. It cleans very easily in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: works great, I use it mostly for oatmeal, it's perfect and yes easy to clean too, doesn't take up much space
customer_reviews.author: Janet Williams Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine at a great price
customer_reviews.text: If your needing a small crock pot that does the job of a bigger one then buy this one. Also very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size for small gatherings
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect size for a small gathering of people. I do wish that the cord was longer as it you use it on a table for a gathering or open house it will not reach a plug to keep warm. If it is staying on a counter there is no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: GenaQ

customer_reviews.title: Nice small crockpot
customer_reviews.text: Love the small footprint. Perfect for 1-3 servings. Heats very evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hull

customer_reviews.title: It's ON or it's OFF. No Temp Controls
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to heat and melt sculpting materials. There's no way to control the temperature. I melted wax to 250F with the dial on 'High' then changed the dial to 'Low.' I left it on low for 30mins, checked the temperature, and it was still at 250F. I changed the dial to 'Warm' and waited for another 30mins. The temperature was still 250F. I'm disappointed I can't use this at lower temperatures. I expected the approximate temperatures to range from 150F to 300F, as is standard for slow cookers.
customer_reviews.author: Sven A G Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I already had a crock pot but needed something for keeping queso dip warm at a holiday party. This was perfect! I know it will come in handy for small meals. Love that the crock is removable for washing. And the price was good, too.
customer_reviews.author: smr61754

customer_reviews.title: 8 MONTHS OF HEAVY USE NOW
customer_reviews.text: A great deal, a great price. Thank god no digital controls. Analog is equivalent to durable and cost effective. I only use a microwave at work to boil water as they simply ruin the texture of good food. So I keep a few crocks of this size in stock, 1 at work and 2 at home. My 15 year old unit at work failed because I left it on with nothing in it accidentally.
customer_reviews.author: SUNnFUN

customer_reviews.title: Works great, perfect size for 2 people.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little cooker. Small footprint for my small kitchen, and easy to use. The high heat setting gets liquid boiling. I use it mainly to cook beans. Holds a cup and a half of dry beans, which is just right for us.
customer_reviews.author: mahina

customer_reviews.title: Just sent the box
customer_reviews.text: I received the item, but it was in the original product box. Some just picked the crockpot off the shelve and slapped a label on it! There was no tape on the ends to secure it. Anyone could have open the box and taken the contents out!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Prefect little crockpot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little crockpot to cook my soups in on a meal plan I am on to help them taste a little more like regular soups. It's awesome! Works exactly like a fullnaozed crockpot, but just little.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Its just the wife and I. This little crock pot provides enough for two without taking up a lot of counter space. I took dried beans and soaked them before slowly cooking them for a few hours. Tasted great.
customer_reviews.author: Magnoliazone6

customer_reviews.title: Great little slow cooker!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little slow cooker! Good price and size for 1 to 2 people. I use it to cook meals for my small 15 lb dog and I. From oakmeals, sweet potatoes to soup and stew, you can count on it!
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: PURCHASED FOR CHEESE FONDUE
customer_reviews.text: Small size good. 3 warming/heating positions. has a top to retain heat. Enjoyed our first cheese Fondue after we preheated our cheeses then added them to the crock pot to keep warm on HIGH heat.
customer_reviews.author: A. Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for small quantities.
customer_reviews.text: We use it mainly for cooking steel cut oats over night. I like that I can switch from low heat to warm as soon as I'm up to keep it warm until we are ready to eat it. We also used it to slow cook a batch of split pea soup which had failed to soften.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This little compact slow cooker is fabulous!! So convenient for small gatherings or cooking for 2-3 at home. Great for making soups, chili, dips, just all sorts of small quantity food stuff. So happy with my purchase...already had 2 larger crock pots, but I use this one more than the large ones. I got this for a good price for something I use so often!
customer_reviews.author: S. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my single 35 yo son who was recently seriously injured & is unable to stand at all to prepare foods so this is perfect for him. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: ME.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and so useful
customer_reviews.text: This us a gift. i have had one for years and use it all the time for dips. It is just the right size and so easy to take when i take a dip to someones home or work.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Fincham

customer_reviews.title: I love this slow cooker.
customer_reviews.text: Set to low, high, or warm. It's simple, but isn't that the point? I love the food I made using this slow cooker. YUM. I recommend a larger size if cooking for 3 or more people.
customer_reviews.author: VingTsunProtege

customer_reviews.title: Slow Cooker has no real warm feature
customer_reviews.text: The temperature on the low setting and warm setting is the same about 200 degrees. No gasket on the lid either. Returned. It was size l wanted, just didn't work to keep cheese dip at a warm temperature. High did produce a simmer/low boil.
customer_reviews.author: JUDY K.

customer_reviews.title: Small with inner crock pot
customer_reviews.text: Like the small size. No timer feature. is a negative. Could not set and leave all day as it will not turn off. However, could not find a small one with timer feature any where on-line.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie  in Clarkston

customer_reviews.title: gave as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my mom for a christmas gift so she hasn't used it yet. the only negative so far was the fact it didn't come with a few recipes to get her started - she's not much into looking online for recipes.
customer_reviews.author: keebieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Small Crock
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than I thought, which is my own misunderstanding. I couldn’t use it for what I wanted but I know I will use it for other things in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Collie8

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little crock pot for a smalleal or a dip
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a pot luck to bring a dip in. Very sleek looking, and perfect size for a smaller meal or appetizer. Traveled well. Works exactly as described. Would buy other sizes from this company in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Be careful cleaning otherwise perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! I’ve used it for a few months now and have been very pleased. I fortunately read the reviews that said don’t soak it, so I haven’t had any problems cleaning it!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Marple

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little gadget
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase I've made all year. I am a very busy person so this was awesome. I usually cook meals at night while I sleep because I don't trust it when Im gone. It's a small capacity but I cook for 1 person so it's Perfect. I have had no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tdanielle

customer_reviews.title: Not just for entertaining anymore
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my husband to take on the road. Freeze meals in the liners and he takes them with in a cooler. He said when you can’t eat out because all of the restaurants are closed it’s nice to have a hot meal.
customer_reviews.author: Carlye H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: I've had this slow cooker for 3 weeks and have used it daily. It has 2 distinct heating temperatures as well as a warm option. This has replaced the Little Dipper and I like it far better. Besides having temperature options, the size is more versatile and this product has a removable interior which makes clean-up easier. I can't think of what to say other than it has performed perfectly. The pot has a 1 year warranty and the price is definitely right!
customer_reviews.author: Karen S. Crane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Little Slow Cooker!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was not expecting much because the price was sooo reasonable but this little slow cooker is excellent! My husband takes his lunch to work every day and uses this to heat it up. It works just as well as the big ones. Have since ordered a second one for a coworker who saw my husband’s and wanted his own! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small cooker, but this is EXTREMELY small and didn't seem worth using after trying it (lots of prep for a small portion.) But it did work, so if you're looking for a tiny cooker, this will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: CShopper

customer_reviews.title: Quality item worth your time
customer_reviews.text: Great little crockpot to cook small recipes in, it's easy to clean and weights nothing. Great for sauce and gravy and single serving soups.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: the little train that could
customer_reviews.text: I needed something small and cooks rice without burning my favorite dish, Dirty Rice. Took about ! and a half to 2 hours long. Being patient was worth it. My next dish will be shrimp and rice with stir fry vegetables topped with garlic butter. This gizmo is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: steve s.

customer_reviews.title: One person crockpot
customer_reviews.text: I very much like this little crockpot. It’s great for one person meal or two. Easy to clean light weight I have had good luck with this. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Regula

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Just the right size for a small family!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought it for pot lucks at work because it is small enough for dips yet not too big. Well I used it for BBQ pulled chicken for dinner and it was plenty big enough for a family of three! And clean up was easy because the crock is removable!
customer_reviews.author: rjbarr

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 - One for Home and One for School
customer_reviews.text: I love this slow cooker. Now that we're empty-nesters, this is the perfect size for just the two of us. Also, being a teacher, I can use this personally as well as professionally in the classroom. We recently used it for a 3rd grade solid to liquid experiment. I am not allowed to have flame in the classroom, so this was perfect to melt some items - like a double broiler.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: Got this to heat up my lunches at work
customer_reviews.text: Rather than waste some of my precious time running to the microwave, I have been using this to heat my lunch at work. Great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: HELP!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can someone please reach out to me? I bought your unit in February and it has failed in August. I can not find a link to file a warranty claim to replace. Can someone please reach out to me to assist with a repair or a replacement? Sincerely, jerry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Elite Gourmet MST-250XS Electric Slow Cooker, Adjustable Temp, Entrees, Sauces, Stews & Dips, Dishwasher Glass Lid & Ceramic Pot, 1.5Qt Capacity, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: The Elite Gourmet 1.5 Qt. Mini Slow Cooker is perfect for cooking and serving small one-pot meals and appetizers such as soups, stews, meatballs, dips, and sauces. It's a great kickoff for a fondue party or where everyone prepares their favorite dip in their 1.5 Qt. Mini Slow Cooker. This versatile small appliance can be a single person's best companion as well as the all-star at your next Super Bowl party. It features low and high temperature settings, a keep-warm setting allowing you to keep your meal hot and fresh before it’s served, and an attractive stainless steel finish. It includes a removable inner stoneware pot that’s easy to clean, with a tempered glass lid with metal rim for easy viewing of cooking cycle and cool-touch handles and knob for safe handling.
feature_bullets: Convenient LOW / HIGH / KEEP WARM settings
Attractive stainless steel finish and tempered clear glass lid
Cool-touch handles and knobs while powered at 120 watts
Dishwasher safe glass lid and stoneware pot
Convenient LOW / HIGH / KEEP WARM settings
Dishwasher safe glass lid and stoneware pot
